works.description: For the fashionistas who are looking for a stylish way to contribute to the earthquake relief efforts in Japan, the Italian fashion and leather goods label Gucci is offering a limited edition $100 charity bracelet, with all the proceeds going to the Japanese Red Cross Society. The leather bracelet has the brand’s iconic horsebit detailing, with a strip of white and red that stands for the colors of the Japanese flag. The one-size-fits-all buckle bracelet carries a sweet message that reads “Gucci loves you.”
